reviews.text:
Absolutely fabulous tasty food. Seriously one of the best, and have to have a curry on holiday wherever we are in the world.
I had prawn curry and husband chicken bhuna. Lots of herbs and spices got the taste buds. Just the right hotness too.
Staff efficient and friendly. Clean well decorated and furnished restaurant.
Would highly recommend.
Two seniors from Cheshire UK
Tried this lovely restaurant while on holiday in Malta. Great food, clean, tidy, and wonderful staff! Food had great taste and didn't disappoint, Thank you!
The staff were super kind and friendly! The meals were delicious and very reasonable! Totally recommend the vegetarian dishes as well :))
Great service with lots of menu choices. Food was good. The staff is very friendly and attentive. The waiter helped us make the order. Explained about dishes. Good wishes from Lithuania  ðŸ‡±ðŸ‡¹.

The food and the workers are incredible. We were greeted the moment we walked in and the whole crew took really great care of us. They always had a smile and just made you feel comfortable. And fortunately for us, the food matched their personality, amazing. We got a curry and tikka dish that was really good. The Nan of course was out of this world and the appetizer went perfect with the whole meal. Definitely 5 stars all around.
